api.command: CLOUDFLARE_INCLUDE_PROCESS_ENV=true npx hush run -t api-workers -- pnpm --filter @slopcade/api dev

metro.command: node ../scripts/export-godot.mjs --once && node scripts/generate-registry.mjs && RCT_METRO_PORT=8085 npx hush run -t app -- npx expo start --dev-client --port 8085

web.command: node ../scripts/export-godot.mjs --once && node scripts/generate-registry.mjs && npx hush run -t app -- npx expo start --web --port 8085

storybook.command: npx hush run -t app -- pnpm storybook
